SELECT t.id id, t.contract_id contractId, t.seq_no seqNo, t.bespoke_date bespokeDate, t.acc_no accNo, t.trade_amount tradeAmount, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.mchn_child mchnChild, t.bespoke_date bespokedate, t.trade_state tradeState, t.real_trade_amount realTradeAmount FROM t_gq_fss_trade_apply t where t.apply_type=11091001
and t.contract_id like concat('%',#{contractId},'%')
and t.seq_no like concat('%',#{seqNo},'%')
and t.mchn_child like concat('%',#{mchnChild},'%')
AND 1=1
AND t.create_time BETWEEN #{creatTime} AND SYSDATE()
AND t.create_time BETWEEN #{creatTime} AND #{modifyTime}
AND t.create_time < #{modifyTime}

SELECT t.id id, t.apply_no applyNo, t.apply_type applyType, t.business_no businessNo, t.busi_type busiType, t.contract_id contractId, t.seq_no seqNo, t.bespoke_date bespokeDate, t.acc_no accNo, t.trade_amount tradeAmount, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.mchn_child mchnChild, t.apply_state applyState, t.trade_state tradeState, t.count count, t.success_count successCount, t.real_trade_amount realTradeAmount, t.channel_no channelNo FROM t_gq_fss_trade_apply t where t.apply_type=#{applyType} and t.busi_type=#{busiType}
and t.acc_no like concat('%',#{accNo},'%')
and t.business_no like concat('%',#{businessNo},'%')
AND t.create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startime},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
